Generated Narrative: ValueSet mrs-score-vs

  • Include all codes defined in http://tecnomod-um.org/CodeSystem/mrs-score-cs version 📦0.1.0

name: MRsScoreVS
title: Modified Rankin Scale (mRS) Score ValueSet
description: This ValueSet includes all modified Rankin Scale (mRS) grades defined in the MRsScoreCS CodeSystem (0â€“6). It is intended to be bound to Observation.valueCodeableConcept when the Observation.code indicates that the observation represents an mRS score.
